CyberPixels





    CyberPixels($CYPX) is the official token of CyberCitizens!
    The token will be used for various activities both on our website and within the CyberVerse!

CyberVerse




    The CyberVerse is full of opportunities to live, create, invest, build, explore, make businesses and much more!

CyberVerse




    The CyberVerse is full of opportunities to live, invest, build, explore, make businesses and much more!

CyberPixels


    CyberPixels($CYPX) is the official token of CyberCitizens!
    The token will be used for various activities both on our website and within the CyberVerse!

Game Features

  • CyberCitizens

    Playable characters living in the CyberVerse.

  • Bank

    Earn staking rewards in the city's bank!

  • Real-Estate

    Buy estate and customize them to your liking.

  • NFT Music

    Get free music NFTs to listen to ingame by hodling your CyberCitizens

  • Marketplace

    Marketplace allows individuals to buy and sell NFTs within the city!

  • Token

    In-game utility token

  • Pets

    Hatch your CyberEgg

  • Lvl Chips

    Increase your CyberCitizens' level

  • Cyberia

    Place where CyberCitizens' live

  • Museum

    Place where citizens can see historical NFT's and statues of prominent Ergonauts!

  • Cyber Treasury

    Projects community wallet

  • Jobs

    Earn money and XP credits by working jobs in the CyberVerse.
